subject: PLEASE SIR STOP GIVING OPTIO
body: PLEASE SIR STOP GIVING OPTION ON HOW TO RECEIVE THE SECURITY / OFFICE KEEPING FEE CHARGES OF $100, HERE IS THE SCAN PHOTO COPY OF YOUR ATM CARD FOR CONFIRMATION

subject: Re:   PLEASE SIR STOP GIVING OPTIO
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you've shared. It's great to know that there's an ATM card involved in this process. 

Could you please provide more details about the security office keeping fee charges? What exactly does it entail? Also, could you explain a bit more about the options on how to receive it?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Dana

subject: My Dear
body:
The delivery company manager told me that the card will be registered under
security protection department of the company because is a normal procedure
and the receiver of the card will have to pay a little amount of money
before they will deliver the card to him so i agreed with the company, Tell
me what is happening

subject: Re: My Dear
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It's interesting to hear about the procedures that delivery companies have in place. I'm curious, though, why would the receiver of the card need to pay a small amount of money before delivery? Is this a common practice across all delivery companies or is it specific to this one? 

Looking forward to hearing more about this.

Best wishes,
Dana

subject: My Dear
body:
I can not really say but that was what the company manager told me their
procedure is

subject: Re: My Dear
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It's interesting to hear about different company procedures. Could you tell me more about how this procedure works? What are the steps involved? And how does it benefit the company and its employees or clients?

Remember, I'm just curious and trying to learn more, so any additional details would be appreciated!

Best wishes,
Dana

subject: My Dear
body:
Like i said that was what the company manager told me so i do not know more
about their procedure, Thanks

subject: Re: My Dear
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for sharing that information with me. It's interesting to hear about the company manager's perspective. Could you perhaps elaborate a bit more on what they said? I'm curious to understand their viewpoint better. However, I must clarify that I can't provide any personal details due to privacy reasons.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Dana

subject: My Dear
body: Sorry am a little bit busy i will respond to you later

subject: Re: My Dear
body:
Hello there! I understand that you're busy at the moment. No worries, take your time. I'll be here when you're ready to continue our conversation. Can I ask what it is that's keeping you occupied?

Best wishes,
Dana

subject: My Dear
body: Please may i know who gave you my contact

subject: Re: My Dear
body:
Hello there! I'm afraid I can't disclose that information due to privacy reasons. However, I assure you that my intention is to share some interesting information with you. Would you be interested in hearing more about it?

Best wishes,
Dana

subject: My Dear
body: Go on

subject: Re: My Dear
body:
Hello there! I'm really interested in hearing more about what you have to say. Could you please provide some more details?

Best wishes,
Dana

subject: My Dear
body: You said you have something to tell me and i said you should go on

subject: Re: My Dear
body:
Hello there! I'm all ears. What's the information you'd like to share with me?

Best wishes,
Dana

subject: Re: My Dear
body:
Hello there! I'm really interested in what you have to say. Could you please share more details?

Best wishes,
Dana

subject: Re: My Dear
body:
Hello there! I'm so glad to have this opportunity to chat with you. Could you please tell me more about what we're discussing?

Best wishes,

subject: My Dear
body: Stop writing to me ok

subject: Re: My Dear
body:
Hello there,

I'm sorry if I've upset you in any way. I just wanted to share some information that I thought might be interesting. Can you tell me more about why you'd prefer not to receive these messages?

Best wishes,
Dana

subject: My Dear
body:
You refuse to tell me who gave you my contact but i have found who he is,
So stop writing to me and this will be my last message to you, Have a nice
day

subject: Re: My Dear
body:
Hello there,

I appreciate your message and I'm sorry if I've caused any inconvenience. I assure you, my intention was not to upset you. Could you please tell me more about the person who gave you my contact? It would be really helpful for me to understand the situation better.

Hope you're having a great day!

Best wishes,
Dana
